prompts: Create a monkey-like Pokemon with a playful personality and vibrant colors.
Show me a Pokemon featuring a large green leaf and a wise expression.
Imagine a Normal-type Pokemon that resembles a sage, complete with unique markings.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with a mix of purple and gray tones and a friendly demeanor.

Make a Pokemon that enjoys the tranquility of forest habitats and has distinct facial features.
